changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on Factor Form and OTP (One-Time Purchase) feature development, price migration work, and extensive test refactoring. Multiple teams are working on UI components for multi-cadence subscriptions, migrating pricing structures across various components, and cleaning up test files while adding new product templates.

features.name: Factor Form OTP Cart Creation
features.description: Implementation of cart creation functionality for One-Time Purchase in Factor Form

features.name: Multi-Cadence My Deliveries UI
features.description: User interface for managing multiple delivery cadences in my-deliveries section

features.name: Multi-Cadence Cancellation UI
features.description: User interface for handling cancellations with multiple cadence options

features.name: New PDP Template
features.description: Created new Product Detail Page template

features.name: Plan Price Rendering in Settings
features.description: Display plan pricing information within settings interface

features.name: Order Summary with Cash Credits
features.description: Added cash credits messaging to Order Summary component with refactoring

features.name: OTP Attributes in Checkout Events
features.description: Added OTP attributes to zipCodeValidation event and payment error tracking on checkout page

decisions.rationale: Feature flag enablement for TPT product line

decisions.what: Remove deprecated starterBoxMap from static configs

decisions.rationale: Configuration migration for product family proteins
Systematic migration of pricing structure in MonthlyPlanOption and ProductPriceSummary

refactors.reason: Improve test organization and naming conventions
Remove obsolete tests and improve test quality
Refactor test implementation for calorie adjustment functionality
Refactoring as part of RFC implementation with cash credits feature
refactors.impact: Order Summary component and related UI (TPT-2153, TPT-2286)

fixes.issue: Multi-pet subscription redirect when cancelled due to pet death via CC

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Major development area for OTP functionality and multi-cadence support

entities.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase)
entities.context: New purchase flow being integrated with cart creation, state management, and feature gates

entities.name: TPT
entities.context: Product line receiving multiple updates including MSS flag, test refactoring, and UI enhancements

entities.name: Order Summary
entities.context: Enhanced with cash credits messaging and refactored per RFC

entities.name: Checkout Page
entities.context: Enhanced with OTP attributes and payment error tracking

key_patterns: Systematic price migration across multiple components (GOC-3293, GOC-3296)
Feature flag driven development for OTP and MSS features
Extensive test refactoring and cleanup as a dedicated effort
Multi-cadence subscription support being built across UI layers
RFC-driven refactoring for Order Summary component
Separation of concerns between UI, state management, and cart operations for OTP
Configuration migration pattern for product families
Event tracking enhancement with OTP-specific attributes
